MuelSyseKhas:EcoSpecimen.NAME: Ecological Specimen
MuelSyseKhas:EcoSpecimen.FLAVOR: It seems to be a sample of some rare plant
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain 1 #yFlowingShape and [E] .

MuelSyseKhas:ExuberantPlant.NAME: Exuberant Plant
MuelSyseKhas:ExuberantPlant.FLAVOR: Every inch of growth is filled with unpredictable wild beauty
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain 1 #yFlowingShape, 2 #yEcology and [E] , draw 1 card.

MuelSyseKhas:EmergencyEcoDevice.NAME: Emergency Ecological Device
MuelSyseKhas:EmergencyEcoDevice.FLAVOR: Every activation brings a glimmer of hope.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add 1 #yPottedPlant to your hand

MuelSyseKhas:CoconutShell.NAME: Half Coconut Shell
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, for each point of #yEcology, gain 4 Block

MuelSyseKhas:FluidGetter.NAME: FlowingShape Printer
MuelSyseKhas:FluidGetter.FLAVOR: Can provide unexpected help to the user at critical moments
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the 2nd turn, gain 3 #yFlowingShape

MuelSyseKhas:OceanVoice.NAME: Voice of the Ocean
MuelSyseKhas:OceanVoice.FLAVOR: This power is like the tides of the deep sea, sometimes calm, sometimes turbulent
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the 4th turn, double your #yStrength and #yDexterity
